Uses of Class
gov.niarl.his.privacyca.PrivacyCaException

  • Packages that use PrivacyCaException 
    Package Description
    gov.niarl.his.privacyca
    This package contains all base classes that are used by the HIS Privacy CA and Client Provisioner.

    • Uses of PrivacyCaException in gov.niarl.his.privacyca

      Methods in gov.niarl.his.privacyca that throw PrivacyCaException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TpmIdentityProof TpmIdentityRequest.decrypt(RSAPrivateKey privCaKey)
      Decrypt the identity request to get the identity proof.
      byte[] TpmIdentityRequest.decryptRaw(RSAPrivateKey privCaKey)
      Decrypts the Identity Request, and DOES NOT assume the contents are an Identity Proof.
      TpmSymmetricKey TpmSymCaAttestation.encrypt(int algMode, short encScheme, boolean TrousersModeIV, boolean TrousersModeSymkeyEncscheme)
      Encrypt the stored certificate using the specified options.
      void TpmAsymCaContents.encrypt(RSAPublicKey ekPubKey, boolean TrousersModeBlankOeap)
      Encrypt the TpmAsymCaContents for return to the TPM.
      static X509Certificate TpmUtils.PartiallyProcessIdentityRequest(byte[] idRequestBlob, RSAPrivateKey caPrivKey, X509Certificate caPubCert, int validityDays)
      Used by the Privacy CA (version 1) to process Identity Requests that do not contain an EC.
      static idResponse TpmUtils.ProcessIdentityRequest(byte[] idRequestBlob, RSAPrivateKey caPrivKey, X509Certificate caPubCert, int validityDays)
      Take an incoming identity request, unpack the contents, create an identity certificate, and return it in the properly formated form.
      byte[] TpmAsymCaContents.toByteArray()
      Get the encrypted TpmAsymCaContents as a byte array suitable for delivery to the TPM with TPM_ActivateIdentity.
      byte[] idResponse.toByteArray()
      If needed, this function provides a byte array of the Asym and Sym parts of the response concatenated together.
      Constructors in gov.niarl.his.privacyca that throw PrivacyCaException 
      Constructor and Description
      TpmIdentityProof(byte[] blob, boolean IV, boolean symKey, boolean oaep)
      Create new TpmIdentityProof object by parsing the decrypted data from a TPM_IDENTITY_REQ.
      TpmIdentityRequest(byte[] blob)
      Create a new TpmIdentityRequest object by initializing with a byte blob from the output of Tspi_TPM_CollateIdentityRequest.
